name: Cubic (itch) (the_Law_1)
description:
I made a small 2D platformer to serve as a template for future projects. 

Beat the 12 levels, including a final boss, as fast as possible :)

Music, sound, and some level design by Aritche.

Game design and programming by me.

It was made with controller inputs in mind but can be played with mouse/keyboard. I made a windows build in case there's a problem with the web version but they're both the same.

It's obviously very prone to bugs and weird behaviours so let me know if you see any and thanks for understanding.

Have fun and let me know what you think !
